title: Comfy White Microfiber Salon Towels - 10 Pack , 29" x 16"
description: DescriptionThis towel has the most amazing durability, absorbency, and stain resistance there is to offer. These super-soft, hard-wearing microfiber towels are perfect for all your hair care & beauty needs.Features10 Nail & Spa Towels.Long-lasting microfiber towels - 6x more durable than cotton.Ultra-absorbent - 3x more than cotton.Stain resistant.Will not shrink.80% polyester, 20% polyamide.SpecificationsWidth: 16"Length: 29"- All dimensions listed are approximations.

title: Hair Tamer Black "Ergo" Detangling Hair Brush Teezer
description: DescriptionHair Tamer  professional detangling hairbrush is designed for professional hair salons. It's a super smooth operator that works the minute hair is lathered and rinsed. Glides through wet, vulnerable and color treated hair with no pulling, tugging or yanking. Hair peace at last!Try the Hair Tamer and you'll be amazed by the ease of brushing, as well as how it virtually stops breakage and split ends.FeaturesErgonomic designs.Fits right into the palm of your hand.Detangles hair with ease.Works on even the curliest, most knotted hair.Hair slips through the unique bristle configuration.Gentle & painless.Virtually stops breakage & split ends.Conforms to shape of the head.Handle provides added control.SpecificationsHeight: 7.5"Length: 2.5"Width: 1.5"
